trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Moncton
There were no other sightings in Moncton on or around February 15th 1991
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
Summary: My husband and I saw bright lights through my venecian blinds in the field behind my house
divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband and I were watching tv on a Sunday night in February 1991.We decided to shut the tv off and go to bed,it was around 10:30 pm.I was going to lock the doors and pull down the venecian blinds in the back room of the house,which has 4 large windows,when I noticed some very bright lights shining through the lats of the blinds of one window that had the blinds pulled half way down,so I said to my husband as I approached the window,"Wow what the heck is that?" I put my face against the blinds to see what it was,so I peeked between the lats and said to my husband,"You should see how low this plane is!" So I pulled the blind all the way up so we could watch it.I was a little scared because it was too low and close.Then I noticed that it wasn't moving and that it had 3 very bright lights in a triangle pattern with one red pulsating light in the center of it.I thought it looked odd,because I had never seen a plane with that pattern of lights before and there was no green light on it like most planes have.We could not hear the engines either,so we went outside to listen to it,but it was silent.That freeked me out a little so my husband said,It's probably a helicopter.I told him that it was too close for us not to hear it.It was only like 300 feet away.So then I started to think that maybe it could be a UFO,but it wasn't shaped like a disk like most people say.I had never heard of triangle UFO's before.So then I wanted to get its attention,so I started flicking the back lights on and off,like in morse code and flashing a flashlight on and off towards it,then suddenly the craft's lights started coming towards my house.It freeked me out ,so I locked the doors and pulled down the blinds.We watched it for about 20 minutes or so,and then it suddenly,very slowly started to go towards the beach,until I could no longer see it.That was the first of 4 sightings.The second was in the middle of that same week,during the daytime,and the others were in 2007.My son told me that too many people don't report it,so I did my duty and eased my conscience after 18 years and hope others will do the same,so that we get more accurate statistics on UFO sightings.
